annotations.description: The Gin Basil Smash was created by German barman Joerg Meyer at the bar Le Lion in Hamburg around 2008. According to Meyer he was inspired by Dale Degroff's ...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Gin Basil Smash

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Gin
1oz (30ml) Lemon Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Simple Syrup
4-6 Basil Leaves
Basil Leaf Garnish

Muddle Basil Leaves in tin.
Shake all ingredients
Pour over ice cube in rocks glass

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5BcW0OSfa9E
title: Gin Basil Smash
